Class oracle.plsql.PDouble 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----oracle.plsql.PValue
           |
           +----oracle.plsql.PDouble
public class PDouble
extends PValue
This class encapsulates PL/SQL numbers (real values).

PDouble()
Constructs a null PL/SQL number.
PDouble(double)
Constructs a PL/SQL number.
PDouble(int)
Constructs a PL/SQL number.

copy(PDouble)
Copies the PDouble.
doubleValue()
Returns the value of this PDouble as a double.
intValue()
Returns the value of this PDouble as an int.
setValue(double)
Sets the value of this PDouble.
setValue(int)
Sets the value of this PDouble.
toString()
Returns the String representation of this PDouble.

PDouble 
  public PDouble()
Constructs a null PL/SQL number.
PDouble 
  public PDouble(double value)
Constructs a PL/SQL number.
Parameters:
value - the initial value of the PDouble
PDouble 
  public PDouble(int value)
Constructs a PL/SQL number.
Parameters:
value - the initial value of the PDouble

doubleValue 
  public double doubleValue()
Returns the value of this PDouble as a double. You should use isNull() to determine if this value is NULL before getting the double value.
Throws: NullValueException
If the value is NULL.
See Also:
isNull
intValue 
  public int intValue()
Returns the value of this PDouble as an int. You should use isNull() to determine if this value is NULL before getting the int value.
Throws: NullValueException
If the value is NULL.
See Also:
isNull
setValue 
  public void setValue(double value)
Sets the value of this PDouble. To set this PDouble to null, use setNull().
Parameters:
value - the double value to set
See Also:
setNull
setValue 
  public void setValue(int value)
Sets the value of this PDouble. To set this PDouble to null, use setNull().
Parameters:
value - the int value to set
See Also:
setNull
copy 
  public void copy(PDouble value)
Copies the PDouble.
Parameters:
value - the PValue to copy from
toString 
  public String toString()
Returns the String representation of this PDouble.
